# vpowf(_:_:)

**Function**

For each vector element, calculates `X` to the floating-point power of `Y`. The result is more accurate than using exp(log(`X`)*`Y`).

## Declaration

```swift
func vpowf(_: vFloat, _: vFloat) -> vFloat
```

## Power Functions (from vfp.h)

- **vipowf(_:_:)**: For each vector element, calculates `X` to the integer power of `Y`.

items.description: For each vector element, calculates `X` to the integer power of `Y`.
